121.title: The Good ol' Fnaf 1

choices: Answer the phone as a good boy you are
Ignore it you can do it by yourself no need more hints
1211.content:
You is a nightguard workin one... well.. the nighttime XD. Yo uarrived earlier for the job as your manager sujest you to come.
When you enter in the pizzaria you already smeleld the potent smell of oil and cheese and get hit by a gust of cold air from the AC the place seen strange when they are no kids running aorudn adn the arcades are still turned on. You saw you manager Roger waiting you on at a table whiel he look at the big robots that are staying in place at the satge, Freddyka Fazbear, Bonnie the Bunny and Chcia the Chicken that mroe like a duck then a chicken.

After Roger notice you he wave for you to come take a sit near he you look at your watch and it is 11:45pm just 15misn to start you job and you walk and sit on his side. "Hi there Mr. Michael!" said Roger "I called you earlier to talk a bit of what happend here with the chicks over there" He point at the robots. You silent nod and wait the explanation. "So mr. Michael... uhh can i call you Mike?" Roger asked and yo usimply nod "Ok then Mike these robots have soem uhh... special way to release heat... They release their heat in the form of farts..." you seen a bit suprised "What you mean about 'in form of farts'?" you asked, "Well they litteraly far tthe heat out and thsoe things are old so they produce a lot of heat, we keep they smelling good thx for airfreshes that we spray on they so you have to excuse us if the smell don't be good... well i explain this part it will have a phone call when your job start please answer the call you gonan need more tips. I would say more but I'm with a bit of rush here i have to go visit my sister. So well i hope you excuse us for any problems and that you don't decide to quit the job as others that we had" Roger said with a kind smiel and gets up patting you back na giveing you the key to close or open the place if need. When Roger left you walk to the office after close the pizzaria doors and sit on your seat have an old rusty fan o nthe desk that provide a bit more air then the now tunerd off AC.
When the clock hit 12am the phone stared to ring you...
1211.title: Welcome to the Fun!

choices: Close the door that chiken is coming!

12111.content:
As you pick the phone and answer it a voice started to speak, "Uhhh... Hello? Hello Hello? Hi and welcome to the Freddyka's Fazbear Pizza i am your guid for the nights that you gonna bare thought all the week and nexst week if you choose to saty in the place. Well you see the robots are programed to roam aorund in night so their servors don't get rusty due to the fact that they are a bit old robots from the company. Look if they go near your door close it as fast as possible cause they may see you as an ennemie, you see the girls are also programed to make sure the pizzaria be safe so clsoe the doors fast they will saty for some time at the doors then wlak away for reboot or to search you, the naiamotrnics also can see you as a toy... yeah yo uheared it right a toy for their own uh... interething fun. But oy udon't need to worry well you will need to worry if the power runs out... you see our generator is as old as thsoe robtos so it can have a power outrage that will only be able to fix in the daytime. Well today there are only 2 of the girls to worry about the rabbit and the chicken so relax! It is all okay cya tomorrow have a safe day *click*" the call ended "Welp this seen realxing" you said to youself in a sarcastict tone.
When the call eded the clock is makring 12:30am that was a long call... Sunddeley you hear soem noise coming from the stage you take a look on the computer in fornt of you where the cameras are, when you change to the main stage camera you can see the Chica moved and Bonnie was lookign to the camera Freddyka seen to be offline.
A giggle coul be heared form the righ hall you look to the door buttons and then to camera you...

info.brief_description: Welcome to Freddyka's Fazbear Pizza where aniamtornics are girls and with gas problems
info.description:
Uhhh... Hello? Hello Hello? Uhhh... Welcome to Freddyka's Fazbear Pizza! A magical place for fart fetishes to hang out and eat some delicius cheesy pizza! You will take a role of a nightguard or one of the animaotrnics.

Please make sure to follow this rules if you want to add any chapter here:

1- The aniamtornics need to be female
2- You is the only male in the story (except if you choose to be an aniamtornic)
3- They are aniamtornics but if you perfer they can be furrys
4- Sex isn't allowed or if you want to add at least warm the readers first
5- Have fun ^u^

Ps: if you break any of the rules i'll delete the chapter
